name: Dinner Catch
description:
Dinner Catch is a time management delivery game set in a fantasy and whimsical world. The protagonist is Anthony, once a warden frog in charge of defending the water fairy civilization at the bottom of a pond, and now downgraded to their food delivery guy.

Order by order, the player has to master timing, speed and good decision-making to successfully arrive at the end of the working day.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

THE TEAM BEHIND DINNER CATCH

Art Director: Louise P. Jepsen

Design Lead: Alessandro Cutuli

Tech Lead: Philip B. Johansen

Producer & Narrative Designer: Rebecca Veggerby

Programmer: Maria R. Almind

Programmer: Rikke L. Petersen

QA Lead: Frederik Schunck
